name: Ewe Shall Not Pass
description:
As Shmandalf the wizard, herd your wayward flock of sheep to safety while fending off the monsters that prey on them with your wizardly prowess! Manage your farm in between adventures to earn gold and acquire unique spells and upgrades on your path to sheep herding supremacy.

---

**A Mystically Magical Shepherd Experience**
  • Put your sorcerous skills to the test as you defend your herd from monsters.



  • Guide your sheep through treacherous terrains on your otherworldly odyssey through a variety of environments.



  • Power up your spells for everything from combat, to sheep herding, to farming.




---

**Master the Arcane Art of Sheep Farming**
  • Upgrade your sheep farm and expand your flocks and crops to mighty proportions.
  • Raise your sheep for wool, cultivate your garden, then haul them off to the farmer-wizard’s market for gold and assorted arcane goods.


---

**Mandatory Fishing Game**
  • Wizards fish too.
